Question: LOCKLY CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Lockly

Visage Smart Lock

 - Advanced facial recognition technology for keyless entry
 - Most compact internal design
 - Priced at $349
 - Transforms doorway with futuristic security

Flex Touch Pro

 - Adds fingerprint reader to existing deadbolt
 - Suitable for renters

Matter Link Hub

 - Supports most existing smart locks
 - Promises quicker and more reliable connectivity
